definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
needlework/working for a living as a needleworker

sentences.english: When she sews she makes long stitches.
sentences.chinese: 她做针线活时针脚很大。

sentences.english: You know, the ancient Chinese women were supposed to be good at needlework.
sentences.chinese: 知道吗，中国古代女子都得做针线活。

sentences.english: She just did needlework and made tea.
sentences.chinese: 她只是做针线活和泡茶。

sentences.english: The lonely patient derives pleasure from sewing.
sentences.chinese: 那个孤独的病人从针线活儿里获得乐趣。

sentences.english: I used to hate sewing before we got a sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 在我们买来缝纫机之前我最恨做针线活。

sentences.english: I hate having to fetch out the sewing machine every time I want to do some sewing.
sentences.chinese: 每当我想做点针线活时就得把缝纫机搬出来，真讨厌。
做针线活儿，她可是把好手。

sentences.english: She feel very awkward with a needle.
sentences.chinese: 她做针线活时感到很不对劲。

sentences.english: When she sewed she made long stitches.
sentences.chinese: 当她干针线活时，她的针脚总是弄的很长。

sentences.english: She is an excellent housemaid, and works very well at her needle.
sentences.chinese: 她是个出色的女佣人，擅长做针线活。

sentences.english: They were chattering (discursively on a variety of topics) over their needlework.
sentences.chinese: 她们一边做针线活一边闲扯个不停。

sentences.english: Please carry on with your sewing. I'll tell you a story.
sentences.chinese: 继续做针线活儿，我给你讲个故事。

sentences.english: They are chattering over their needlework.
sentences.chinese: 她们一边做针线活一边唠叨个不停。

sentences.english: All the stiching has been done by hand.
sentences.chinese: 所有的针线活多是手工完成的。

definition: needlework/working for a living as a needleworker
flying needle and running seam (idiom); skillful needlework
erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]
to be skillful with one's hands/to be manually adroit
